document.full_text: rajat k. gupta said the s.e.c. violated his rights by bringing its case in an administrative proceeding instead of suing in a court.
document.title: ex-goldman director sues s.e.c. over galleon case
lines_and_colors: rajat k. gupta said the s.e.c. violated his rights by bringing its case in an administrative proceeding instead of suing in a court.
